email_body:
Please Help,

Sorry for intruding into your privacy,let me introduce myself. I am 
Miss Hadija Samir from Egypt. Daughter of late Mr. Mahmoud Shabah 
Samir. died along with My mother Mrs salamafereg Samir. in Egypt Air 
Flight 990, air crash.For more information about this crash and 
person's you can contact this website):
http://www.zenpageweavers.com/malikahti/journal/flight.htm 

I am constrained to contact you because of the maltreatment I am 
receiving from mystep mother. She planned to take away all my late 
father's  treasury and properties from me since the unexpected death of 
my beloved Father and mother. 

 Presently, I  am in the refugee camp where I am presently seeking  
Refugee I wish to contact you personally for a long term  business 
relationship and investment assistance in your Country.

 My father of blessed memory deposited the sum of US$3, 300, 000.00
(ThreeMillion Three  Hundred Thousand United States dollars Only), 
where he has made me as the next of kin. However, I shall forward you 
with the necessary documents on confirmation of your acceptance to 
assist me for the transfer and investment of the fund.

Please all communications should be through this email address only for 
confidential purposes. Sugest how much you will want me to give you for 
taking part in this business

As soon as I receive your positive response showing your interest I 
will put things in action immediately. In the light of the above, I 
shall appreciate an urgent message indicating your ability and 
willingness to handle this transaction sincerely. 

Awaiting your urgent and positive response. 
Yours Sincerely, 
Miss Hadija Samir
